verbose_text: In the first step, called Signal 1, cells are primed by transcriptionally upregulating sensor proteins (e.g., NLRP3 and caspase-4), accessory proteins (e.g., guanylate binding proteins), and substrates (e.g., pro-IL-1beta), or post-translational modification of sensors (e.g., deubiquitylation of NLRP3).
